page.title: 15The Helicopter Service.
page.content: The helicopter landing area is in the north of this block and to the west of the village.Castle Air Charters of Liskeard run the service(by contract with the Landmark Trust).The flying time from Liskeard is 25 minutes. They use 3 types of craft:Agusta Bell Jet Ranger,Long Ranger and 109 (a twin engined craft).4 or 7 can be carried depending on type.From Hartland Point to Lundy takes about 7 minutes.We went over in a 4 seater and came back in a 7 seater-the 7 seater was slightly faster. The charge is the same for adults and children-but it is an expensive service to run and the Landmark Trust make no profit out of it. It runs every Saturday during the season and continues as long as numbers justify it.All bookings should be made through the Landmark Trust. {Alistair Day.
